sections.name: Inkdrop
sections.text: Not all handcrafts are intended for war. The inkdrop is an infiltrator used by spellcasters to learn secrets or alter documents. Embodied in a single fist-sized drop of ink, the inkdrop can glide across a page, changing characters or removing them altogether, with devastating consequences for statecraft.

sections.name: Animated Handcraft
Calligraphic Embellishments
sections.text: Calligraphy is a common addition to the animated objects of Tian Xia. Although much of it is decorative, some calligraphy carries enchantments that generally function as weapon runes until the construct is broken.

sections.name: Handcraft Creations
sections.text: Animated handcrafts vary considerably in appearance, reflecting the temperament and tastes of their creators. When describing animated objects from different origins, consider how those origins and traditions are reflected in the final product. Common motifs in Tian animated handcrafts include woven straw, silk embroidery, lacquered wood, or mother-of-pearl inlays. Purely decorative handcrafts might have more outlandish elements, such as live fish in glass tanks or living silk kites that battle each other in the skies above wealthy neighborhoods.

Many types of animated constructs, objects, and handcrafts have existed in Tian Xia. Some, like the terra-cotta soldiers of Lingshen, are well-known. Others are rarer and less commonly encountered. Tian animated handcrafts are built from traditional artisan materials of differing rarity and with varying levels of effort, relying on crafting skill and quality components more than simple spellcasting.

traits.name: Tiny
traits.text: *Space:* Less than 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 0 feet, *Reach (Long):* 0 feet.  Multiple Tiny creatures can occupy the same square.  At least four can fit in a single square, though the GM might determine that even more can fit.  Tiny creatures can occupy a space larger creature as well, and if their reach is 0 feet, they must do so in order to attack.

traits.name: Construct
traits.text: A construct is an artificial creature empowered by a force other than vitality or void.

traits.name: Mindless
traits.text: A mindless creature has either programmed or rudimentary mental attributes. Most, if not all, of their mental attribute modifiers are –5. They are immune to all mental effects.

interaction_abilities.name: Perfect Memory
interaction_abilities.text: An inkdrop remembers the exact pattern of any ink it moves over physically.

automatic_abilities.name: Blotting
automatic_abilities.text: While a creature has the inkdrop grabbed or pinned, it can destroy the inkdrop by smudging the inkdrop out with an Interact action.

ability.name: Blinding Ink
ability.text: A creature critically struck by the inkdrop's pseudopod is blinded by the ink until it clears its eyes using an Interact action.

ability.name: Ink Blot
ability.text: The inkdrop leaves a pattern it remembers over a square foot of surface. If there's existing non-magical ink on the surface, the inkdrop erases the non- magical ink.
